text: @dansabbagh @maitlis Interesting under Mayor @SadiqKhan, last wk Police wore no riot gear, instructed to back off at signs of confrontation & no 5pm curfew. Simple solution. Ban ALL marches otherwise be seen as not being impartial. Be astonished if #COVID19 doesn't spread bcos this/last wkend.
